subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick Nash scored a goal in his fifth consecutive game, on a shot between his legs, and Pascal Leclaire stopped 36 shots to lead the host Columbus Blue Jackets to a 3-0 victory against the St. Louis Blues.
snippet: Rick Nash scored a goal in his fifth consecutive game, on a shot between his legs, and Pascal Leclaire stopped 36 shots to lead the host Columbus Blue Jackets to a 3-0 victory against the St. Louis Blues.
